item.title: Deal of the day: Book lie-flat business-class seats to South America starting at 35,000 points
item.description: Combine great partner redemption rates with a potentially unique transfer bonus to fly to South America in comfort and style for less.

item.title: Google Flight Deals is live: New ways to save on travel with an assist from artificial intelligence
item.description: Here's what we loved about Google's new artificial intelligence Flight Deals tool, and what still needs work.

item.title: 10 hotels where your Amex Platinum hotel credit covers half (or more) of your stay
item.description: Maximize the American Express Platinum's hotel statement credit for a possible free or very low-cost stay at these amazing hotels and resorts.

item.title: Credit card transfer bonuses (September): 50% bonus to Turkish Airlines, 30% bonus to Virgin Atlantic and more
item.description: Here's a look at all the current transfer bonuses involving major credit cards and airline and hotel loyalty programs.

item.title: 10 TPG-recommended items to buy with your $75 Amex Platinum Lululemon credit before Q3 ends
item.description: The Amex Platinum includes a $75 quarterly Lululemon statement credit. Here are the best things to purchase to maximize your credit each quarter.
